body: Nolan.... Can i send the repply app again?
body_tagged: Nolan.... Can i send the repply app again?
title: To NolanDalton.

replies.body: You are welcome to re-apply whenever you like.
replies.body_tagged: You are welcome to re-apply whenever you like.

replies.body: Wait, if our app gets denied, can we make another and upload it right after?
replies.body_tagged: Wait, if our app gets denied, can we make another and upload it right after?

replies.body: Yes, be sure to fix the errors that you were denied for as well.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, be sure to fix the errors that you were denied for as well.

replies.body: Tell me how to apply, it's too confusing.

replies.body: Harness the powers of the sun in order to fuel your dedication to the servers and burn all of the hackers in a beam of fire and hell.

Good luck with your application.

replies.body: Ok so. Go to the "Staff Application" banner on the forums. Once your there, http://avicus.net/forums/a96927be2 click on that link. Then follow the steps on how to apply. Make a new topic and answer the questions. Good Luck
